title: What Dizzy /electronic module should i use?

posts.content:
Hi i am currently running a twin port 1600 with a bugpack quiet pack exhaust 34 pict 3 carb and a pertronix 009 dizzy
It runs nice when in 4th gear on motorway but pulling away warmed up and you hit the usual 009 pict 3 flat spots!
Anyway want to ditch the 009 so question is
I got a bosch 034 dizzy can i use this?
What electronic module is best? Accuspark? Powerspark? Or pertronix?
Or should i buy a new of the shelf svda dizzy?
Again whats best out there for my set up
Confused!
Any advice cheers
